name: Pro League Bubble Shooter Game
description:
*Thousands of real time tournaments played daily*

Burst bubbles for cash and prizes with Pro League Bubble Shooter Skillz.

This special remake of the cult classic bubble shooter game features the Skillz game platform.

Challenge people around the world with Skillz, a competition platform complete with leaderboards, trophies, cash or virtual currency prizes, and an amazing loyalty program that rewards you just for playing! Skillz: eSports for Everyone.

Features:

- 3 minute multi player matches
- match 3 or more bubbles of the same color to pop them
- special powerups appear during the game
- relaxing woodland forest theme and sounds
- Skillz multiplayer competitions against other users

Pro League Bubble Shooter Skillz developed by ePlay Studios, in partnership with Skillz Inc.

#skillz
#esports
#2player
#playpay

For more info check out www.eplaystudios.com
